text:
Dear partners,

we have a contract with you that you will make our REMIT reports of our secondary capacity transactions to ACER.

So, i have 2 questions:

1. Who is your RRM provider?

2. Could you contact us with your RRM provider, becouse we need to declare our natural gas trade deal or could you report this on our behalf, too?

Best regards,

D. Ivanov


--


-------------------------------------
Mail.BG <http://mail.bg> : Безплатен e-mail адрес. Най-добрите характеристики на българския пазар - 30 GB пощенска кутия, 1 GB прикрепен файл, безплатен POP3, мобилна версия и други.
subject: REMIT reporting
